name: trivy
description: Trivy is the worldâ€™s most popular open source vulnerability and misconfiguration scanner. It is reliable, fast, extremely easy to use, and it works wherever you need it.
author: Aqua Security

inputs.name: docker
inputs.label: Run Trivy as a Docker container
inputs.helpMarkDown: This can be useful when being rate limited by dockerhub etc.

inputs.name: loginDockerConfig
inputs.label: Use Docker login task DockerConfig
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use DOCKER_CONFIG ENV as DockerConfig (set by Docker login task).

inputs.name: useSystemInstallation
inputs.label: Use Trivy from system PATH.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use Trivy executable pre-installed as system package. If this option is used, the 'version' option is ignored.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Trivy Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of Trivy to use

inputs.name: exitCode
inputs.label: Override exit code
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set this to 0 to prevent the build failing when Trivy detects issues.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.label: Enable Debug
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable debug logging in build output

inputs.name: devMode
inputs.label: Enable development mode (used for internal testing)

inputs.name: type
inputs.label: Scan Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of scan to perform, can be a filesystem scan or an image scan.

inputs.name: path
inputs.label: Path to scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: The specified path will be scanned using an 'fs' scan type. If this option is used, the 'image' option cannot be set.

inputs.name: image
inputs.label: Image to scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: The specified image will be scanned using an 'image' scan type. If this option is used, the 'path' option cannot be set.

inputs.name: scanners
inputs.label: Override scanners, comma separated
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose which scanners to run (vuln, misconfig, secret).

inputs.name: severities
inputs.label: Override severities, comma separated
inputs.helpMarkDown: The severities (CRITICAL,HIGH,MEDIUM,LOW,UNKNOWN) to include in the scan (comma separated)

inputs.name: ignoreUnfixed
inputs.label: Fixed Only
inputs.helpMarkDown: This means you can't fix these vulnerabilities even if you update all packages.

inputs.name: aquaKey
inputs.label: Aqua API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Aqua API Key is used to upload scan results to your Aqua Security account.

inputs.name: aquaSecret
inputs.label: Aqua API Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Aqua API Secret is used to upload scan results to your Aqua Security account.

inputs.name: options
inputs.label: Additional Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional flags to pass to Trivy command line.

outputVariables.name: spdxjsonReport
outputVariables.description: SPDX JSON report output file path

outputVariables.name: cosignReport
outputVariables.description: Cosign Vuln report output file path
